items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Subtle Christmas, Not Ugly-Sweater Vibes
items.body: I wore this to our adult fellowship Christmas dinner and it was perfect for a festive look without going full ugly Christmas sweater. The bow pattern is cute, subtle, and actually classy. I even received a compliment on it. The sweater is soft, comfortable, and easy to dress up or down. There is a small snag, but I honestly may have caused that since I didnâ€™t inspect it right away when it arrived. Itâ€™s not very noticeable and doesnâ€™t ruin the look. If you want something holiday-appropriate without screaming â€œChristmas sweater,â€ this is a great option. Read more
items.author: MapiH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Oversized Fit Without Sizing Up, So Cute!
items.body: If I could give this more than 5 stars, I would. This sweater is true to size and fits as an oversized sweater in my normal size, which almost never happens. Usually I have to size up to get that cozy, roomy look, but not with this one, itâ€™s perfect just as it is. The color is adorable, the design is super cute, and Iâ€™ve already gotten tons of compliments on it. The knit is soft, not itchy at all, and very comfortable to wear all day. It has that trendy oversized look without feeling bulky or heavy. Itâ€™s easily one of my favorite fall sweaters now. I absolutely love it and Iâ€™m so glad I ordered it! Read more
items.author: DanK

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So cute and perfect style
items.body: I am absolutely in love with this ATHMILE Fall Sweater! I ordered it in Small, Camel, and itâ€™s quickly become one of my favorite pieces in my closet this season. The color is gorgeous â€” a warm, neutral camel tone that goes with just about everything, from jeans to skirts. The bow knit detail is such a cute and feminine touch, adding just enough charm without being over the top. The sweater has that slightly oversized, relaxed fit thatâ€™s both comfy and flattering, perfect for layering over a cami or wearing on its own. The knit is soft and cozy, not itchy at all, and it feels high-quality â€” thick enough for fall and winter, but still breathable. Iâ€™ve already received a ton of compliments wearing it out! Itâ€™s great for everything from casual days out to cozy evenings in. I also love that it holds its shape after washing â€” no stretching or shrinking. If youâ€™re looking for a trendy yet timeless sweater thatâ€™s cute, comfortable, and easy to style, this oneâ€™s a total win. Highly recommend grabbing it before it sells out! Read more
items.author: Macey T

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and soft and stylish- lots of compliments!
items.body: This sweater is soft with a nice pattern, although Iâ€™ll have to be careful washing it so that the red doesnâ€™t turn the bows pink! Because itâ€™s viscose and polyester, that shouldnâ€™t be a problem. My only issue is the size. Pay heed to the oversized description. Itâ€™s more like a tunic. I bought the large and itâ€™s quite roomy. But I paired it with velvet and leather leggings and it was cute and flattering. Read more
items.author: SAJB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sweater!
items.body: Very cute sweater! I originally thought I requested the Black one but the Red still looks excellent! Very comfortable but I do recommend drying on a drying rack after it comes out of the washing machine. Looks too "shrinkable" to put into a dryer. The little bows are very cute and the sweater fits my daughter wonderfully! Great Quality sweater! Read more
items.author: Terry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect oversized sweater and so cute with the bow design ðŸŽ€
items.body: Love this sweater so much. The quality is great. Itâ€™s the perfect oversized fit, super comfy and cozy, and the bow design makes it even cuter. Itâ€™s warm but not overly hot which makes it great for fall or layering. Iâ€™m 5â€™8 and the sleeves go over my hands when I pull them down so it really is an oversized look in the best way. I ordered my normal size large but if you want something shorter or a little more fitted you might want to size down. The material feels soft on the skin and has a good weight to it. Easy to dress up or down and works with jeans, leggings, skirts, boots or sneakers. Definitely a new favorite. Read more
items.author: Krystal Box

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive, Cozy, and with an Elegantly Oversized Fit
items.body: I love how festive and comfortable this roomy ATHMILE Fall Sweater is. I chose the red color and Iâ€™m so glad I did because itâ€™s cheerful without being over the top. This sweater is far too cute to win an â€œugly sweaterâ€ contest, but itâ€™s the perfect way to embrace the holiday season while still looking polished and stylish. I ordered my regular size (small), and the fit is relaxed and roomy without looking oversized or sloppy. The knit is soft and cozy against the skin, making it ideal for cooler weather, and I appreciate that itâ€™s machine washable for easy care. The bow pattern adds just the right touch of playful charm without feeling juvenile. Overall, this is a lovely, comfortable sweater that balances holiday spirit with everyday wearability beautifully. Read more
items.author: Atl Shopper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, Comfortable but not Flattering.
items.body: I ordered the ATHMILE Fall Sweater in a Small, but I really wish there had been an XS option. For reference, I'm 5'5", 120 lbs., 36D bust, 31" waist, and 34" hips. The sweater itself is lightweight, soft, and extremely comfortable, but on my frame, it ended up looking a bit boxy, which you can see in my photos. I also wish I had chosen a different color, as the pink is a bit pale in person. It arrived vacuum-sealed, which protected it well during shipping, but it did create a lot of wrinkles, also visible in the pictures. The length is great, falling just above mid-thigh and comfortably covering my hips. Overall, Iâ€™d recommend this sweater for the comfort and cute design, but if you have a smaller frame than mine, it may not be the most flattering fit. Read more
items.author: Mari B

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pink, Black, Camel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
